ServicePages.airportSubtitle: Reliable airport transfers and assistance for a smooth arrival and departure in Kinshasa.
ServicePages.airportFeature1: Meet & greet at N'Djili International Airport
ServicePages.airportFeature4: Assistance with luggage and customs formalities
ServicePages.airportDescription: Our airport service ensures a seamless transition between the airport and your accommodation. Whether you're arriving or departing, our professional team handles everything — from greeting you at arrivals to ensuring you reach your terminal on time. We monitor flight schedules in real-time to adjust pickup times accordingly.
ServicePages.cityTransferSubtitle: Safe and reliable transfer service between locations in Kinshasa and Kongo Central.
ServicePages.cityTransferFeature4: Experienced drivers who know every route
ServicePages.cityTransferFeature5: Flexible scheduling to match your itinerary
ServicePages.cityTransferDescription: Navigate Kinshasa and Kongo Central with confidence. Our city transfer service connects you to any location safely and comfortably. Whether it's a trip across town or a journey to Kongo Central's natural wonders, our experienced drivers ensure you travel in comfort and arrive on time.
ServicePages.adminHelpSubtitle: Visa assistance, administrative documents and official formalities support.
ServicePages.adminHelpFeature2: Help with travel permits and documentation
ServicePages.adminHelpFeature5: Liaison with local authorities when needed
ServicePages.adminHelpDescription: Navigating administrative processes in a new country can be challenging. Our team provides comprehensive support for all your administrative needs — from visa applications to travel permits and official documentation. We guide you through every step, ensuring all formalities are handled correctly and efficiently.
ServicePages.localSupportSubtitle: 24/7 support from local experts ready to assist you any time during your stay.
ServicePages.localSupportFeature2: Local experts with deep knowledge of the region
ServicePages.localSupportDescription: Our local support team is your lifeline during your stay in Kinshasa and Kongo Central. Available around the clock, our experts provide real-time assistance, recommendations, and emergency support. From finding the best local restaurant to handling unexpected situations, we're always just a call away.

Legal.termsAcceptanceText: By accessing and using KinXplore's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.
Legal.termsServicesText: KinXplore provides travel planning, circuit booking, airport transfers, city transfers, administrative assistance, and local support services in Kinshasa and Kongo Central. All services are subject to availability and confirmation.
Legal.termsLiabilityText: KinXplore's liability is strictly limited to the services included in the booked circuit. We are responsible only for the activities, accommodations, and transport explicitly listed in your confirmed itinerary. Any incidents or issues arising outside of the planned circuit are not covered by KinXplore.
Legal.termsGuideRulesText: Our guides follow strict rules to ensure your safety and experience quality. Any activity happening outside the planned circuit — for example, if a client decides to take a night off on their own or engage in unplanned activities — is not covered by KinXplore. Our responsibility ends where the planned circuit ends.
Legal.termsModificationsText: KinXplore reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. Continued use of our services after modifications constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
Legal.termsContactText: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at contact@kinxplore.com or through the contact form on our website.
Legal.privacyDataCollectionText: We collect personal information that you provide when booking a circuit, requesting a quote, or contacting us. This includes your name, email, phone number, travel preferences, and payment information.
Legal.privacyConfidentialityText: All your personal data is kept strictly confidential. We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
Legal.privacyPartnerSharingText: Some of your information may be shared with our trusted partners — including hotels, restaurants, and transport providers — strictly for reservation purposes only. We never sell your data to third parties for marketing purposes.
Legal.privacyRightsText: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal data at any time. You can also request a copy of all data we hold about you. To exercise these rights, contact us at contact@kinxplore.com.
Legal.privacyContactText: For any questions regarding our privacy practices, please reach out to us at contact@kinxplore.com.
Legal.safetyCircuitCoverageText: KinXplore covers your safety and wellbeing during all activities included in your booked circuit. Our team monitors every step of the planned itinerary to ensure a smooth experience.
Legal.safetyGuideRulesText: Our guides follow strict safety protocols at all times. Anything happening outside the planned circuit — such as a client taking a night off independently or engaging in activities not listed in the itinerary — is not covered by KinXplore. For your safety, we strongly recommend following the planned schedule.
Legal.safetyEmergencyText: During your circuit, our team is available 24/7 for emergency assistance. In case of any issue during the planned activities, contact your guide immediately or reach our support line.
Legal.safetyInsuranceText: We strongly recommend purchasing comprehensive travel insurance before your trip. While KinXplore takes every precaution for your safety during planned activities, travel insurance provides additional protection for unforeseen circumstances.
Legal.safetyContactText: For safety-related questions or to report a concern, contact us at contact@kinxplore.com or call our 24/7 support line.
